languages.text: "Ты жаждешь предвидеть нити Милости Паутины? Напрасно — когда наступит момент, будущее само откроется тебе. До того мы можем только делать что должно и уповать на благословение Его".

traits.locale_text: "Ты жаждешь предвидеть стезю Кеа'Шини? Напрасно — когда наступит момент, будущее само откроется тебе. До того мы можем только делать что должно и уповать на благословение Его".

languages.text: "You wish to foresee what lies along our thread? Do not try. When the hour is right, the future will reveal itself to you. Until then, we can only do what we must and pray for His blessing."
languages.original_text: "Ты жаждешь предвидеть нити Милости Паутины? Напрасно — когда наступит момент, будущее само откроется тебе. До того мы можем только делать что должно и уповать на благословение Его".

traits.locale_text: "You wish to foresee what lies along the way of Keah'shini? Do not try. When the hour is right, the future will reveal itself to you. Until then, we can only do what we must and pray for His blessing."

"You wish to foresee what lies along the way of Keah'shini? Do not try. When the hour is right, the future will reveal itself to you. Until then, we can only do what we must and pray for His blessing."

"You wish to foresee what lies along the way of Keah'shini? Do not try. When the hour is right, the future will reveal itself to you. Until then, we can only do what we must and pray for His blessing."

"You wish to foresee what lies along our thread? Do not try. When the hour is right, the future will reveal itself to you. Until then, we can only do what we must and pray for His blessing."

languages.text: «¿Deseas predecir lo que espera en nuestro hilo? No lo intentes. Cuando llegue el momento, el futuro se te revelará. Hasta entonces, solo podemos hacer lo que debemos y rezar para recibir Su bendición».
languages.original_text: "You wish to foresee what lies along our thread? Do not try. When the hour is right, the future will reveal itself to you. Until then, we can only do what we must and pray for His blessing."

traits.locale_text: «¿Deseas predecir lo que espera en nuestro hilo? No lo intentes. Cuando llegue el momento, el futuro se te revelará. Hasta entonces, solo podemos hacer lo que debemos y rezar para recibir Su bendición».

languages.text: 「私たちの糸に何があるのかを予見したいというの？やろうとしても無駄よ。時が来れば、未来は自ずと明らかになる。それまでは、やるべきことをして、主の祝福を祈るしかないわ」
languages.original_text: "You wish to foresee what lies along our thread? Do not try. When the hour is right, the future will reveal itself to you. Until then, we can only do what we must and pray for His blessing."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちの糸に何があるのかを予見したいというの？やろうとしても無駄よ。時が来れば、未来は自ずと明らかになる。それまでは、やるべきことをして、主の祝福を祈るしかないわ」

languages.text: “你想要预见我们的未来吗？不必尝试，只要时机到来，未来便会展现在你面前。在那之前，我们只要做好必须做好的事情，祈求祂的祝福就好。”
languages.original_text: "You wish to foresee what lies along our thread? Do not try. When the hour is right, the future will reveal itself to you. Until then, we can only do what we must and pray for His blessing."

traits.locale_text: “你想要预见我们的未来吗？不必尝试，只要时机到来，未来便会展现在你面前。在那之前，我们只要做好必须做好的事情，祈求祂的祝福就好。”

languages.text: "Ihr wollt sehen, was Euch auf Eurem Faden erwartet? Versucht es gar nicht erst. Wenn die Stunde gekommen ist, wird sich Euch die Zukunft selbst offenbaren. Bis dahin können wir nur unsere Pflicht tun und auf Seinen Segen hoffen."
languages.original_text: "You wish to foresee what lies along our thread? Do not try. When the hour is right, the future will reveal itself to you. Until then, we can only do what we must and pray for His blessing."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wollt sehen, was Euch auf Eurem Faden erwartet? Versucht es gar nicht erst. Wenn die Stunde gekommen ist, wird sich Euch die Zukunft selbst offenbaren. Bis dahin können wir nur unsere Pflicht tun und auf Seinen Segen hoffen."

languages.text: « Vous voulez savoir ce que nous réserve notre fil ? N'y songez même pas. L'heure venue, l'avenir se révélera spontanément à nous. En attendant, il nous faut faire notre devoir et prier pour qu'Il nous accorde Sa bénédiction. »
languages.original_text: "You wish to foresee what lies along our thread? Do not try. When the hour is right, the future will reveal itself to you. Until then, we can only do what we must and pray for His blessing."

traits.locale_text: « Vous voulez savoir ce que nous réserve notre fil ? N'y songez même pas. L'heure venue, l'avenir se révélera spontanément à nous. En attendant, il nous faut faire notre devoir et prier pour qu'Il nous accorde Sa bénédiction. »

languages.text: "İpliğimizde uzananları öngörebilmek mi istiyorsun? Vakti geldiğinde geleceğin kendini sana gösterecek. O vakte dek tek yapabileceğimiz, yükümlülüğümüzü yerine getirerek O'nun lütfu için dua etmektir."
languages.original_text: "You wish to foresee what lies along our thread? Do not try. When the hour is right, the future will reveal itself to you. Until then, we can only do what we must and pray for His blessing."
